data.title: Escape The Night: The Movie
authors: Contributors to Escape The Night Wiki

data.text:
Escape The Night Season 1 Season 2 Season 3 Season 4 Board Game

'Escape The Night: The Movie' is a upcoming project from the creators of Escape The Night following the cancellation of the original series by YouTube. It is currently in its production stage after a successful fundraising campaign powered by Indigogo.

Synopsis

The year is 1954, a group of friends are fulfilling an oath to explore the “Crimson Manor,” an abandoned estate with a dark history. Once Inside the mansion awakens from its slumber and they find themselves trapped in a maze of complex puzzles and murderous games. The group must decide who lives or dies, but unknown to them one among them shares a twisted past with the history of the manor. The clock is ticking, and if they don't escape before sunrise, they'll become the manors next victims, trapped forever in time. How far are these friends willing to go to Escape The Night?

Funding Goals

$125k (orig. $250k) - We make an awesome 20-minute short film (many episodes of ETN were only 22-min)! It will have scares and twists and answer the question, what happened to Joey at the end of season four?

$500k - We make a 45-minute badass short film with monsters, mayhem and a brief encounter with the Crimson Manor.

$1M+ We make a mind-bending 85-minute feature film. It will be the complete Crimson Manor experience. The one you all really want.

Funding Tiers

$25 - THE ADVENTURER

Thank you for playing the games of death! You get a digital copy of the movie delivered via a link and a digital high-five.

$50 - THE FEARLESS

You get a digital copy of the film and a Blu-Ray copy with campaign exclusive packaging. The Blu-Ray will contain a unique behind-the-scenes featurette no one outside this campaign will receive. You also get a digital copy of the original soundtrack delivered via a link.

$80 - THE WRITER

One step deeper into the darkness. You get everything from the tier above, PLUS a print copy of the original shooting script. It will have numbered scenes, director's notes, and deleted scenes.

$150 - THE TRAPPED IN TIME

You have officially leveled up. This if for those who want it all. You get everything from the tier above, plus a SIGNED copy of the Blu-Ray and the epic Crimson Manor t-shirt you can wear with pride wherever you roam.

$350 - THE PRODUCER'S CIRCLE

You just entered the production office. This tier is for those who want to help shape the film. You get everything above, PLUS access to a private discord where you will be invited to vote and voice your opinion on major decisions i.e., Hollywood and YouTuber casting, location selection, hero wardrobe, monster design, etc. During filming, you will get exclusive behind the scenes photos & videos shot and curated the one and only Daniel Preda. Your name in the end credits of the film. No doubt, by the time the movie is complete, you will feel like you took the journey with us.

$2500 - THE ONE WHO GOT AWAY - LIMITED TO 10

You will hold a piece of this film in your hand forever. You get everything from the Producer's Circle, PLUS one of the unique movie props created for the film. It will be the ACTUAL prop the actors used on set (not a replica), making it even more collectible. Think something like the artifact from season one or the Armageddon Clock from season four. This is truly a one-of-kind prop that can live on your mantle forever. It may be a statue of the Cursed God they unlock or a prismatic cube they decode (below are some hero props from previous seasons to give an example). Note: Additional shipping fees will be charged before shipping based on the weight and size of the artifact.

$3000 - THE PARTICIPANT - LIMITED TO 15
